registration.introduction: Welcome! Please insert the following information:

termsAndConditions.noticeText: By registering you are accepting the
termsAndConditions.listFirst: You should be at least 18 years old to use the application.
termsAndConditions.listSecond: The land cover information you provide, including the photos, will be used for scientific purposes and may be made publicly available.
termsAndConditions.listThird: Any form of data manipulation is not allowed.
termsAndConditions.listFourth: Politecnico di Milano - GEOlab shall not be held responsible for any damage, injury, loss or expense of any kind.

guidelines.listFirst: While taking photos follow the instructions below.
guidelines.listFirstFirst: Respect the direction north, east, south and west.
guidelines.listFirstSecond: Try to hold your device vertical to the ground.
guidelines.listFirstThird: Do not take pictures that would violate privacy, such as of people's and animals' faces or license plates.
guidelines.listFirstFifth: Hold your device in landscape mode.
guidelines.listThird: Do not walk into fields with growing crops.
guidelines.listFourth: Be aware of the dangers around you and do not go into possibly dangerous areas.

menu.selectClassification: Select the classification of your point.

messages.registrationSuccess: Thank you! Now you can start to contribute!
messages.markerPopup: Not your current location? Drag the marker to correct!
messages.contributionSuccess: Thank you very much for the contribution!
messages.allNoInternet: The map displaying all people's contributions can not be shown due to no Internet connection!
messages.registrationNoInternet: Registration fails due to no Internet connection!
messages.gpsError: GPS error! Please drag the marker to set your current location.
messages.gpsErrorAndroid: GPS error! Turn on your geolocation service or drag the marker to set your current location.
messages.contributionSuccessNoInternet: Thank you for the contribution. Note that you are currently in offline mode, please re-open the application once you have Internet connection to share your contributions.
messages.photoUnavailable: Taking photo is available only on Android and iOS applications, and not from browsers.
messages.bingNoInternet: Bing Aerial cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection!
messages.osmNoInternet: OpenStreetMap cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection!
messages.errorStorage: This browser does not support local storage.
messages.errorPrivateMode: Error! Are you in private mode?

stat.contrAllSingle: contribution within 5 km of your current location.
stat.contrAllPlural: contributions within 5 km of your current location.
stat.noContrMy: You have not had any contribution yet!
stat.noContrAll: No body has added a contribution within 5 km of your current location.

about:
Land Cover Collector application has been developed at the GEOlab of Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering at Politecnico di Milano. The purpose of the application is to collect data on land cover classification using the 10 classes of GlobeLand30. It is available in English, Italian, Arabic, Chinese, Spanish and French. It is published as Android and iOS applications and available on web.
It is an open source project, available on GitHub. The project is protected under GLC-3.0 license. The application acknowledges the contributions of the project EmoMap, developed by the Research Group Cartography in the Department of Geodesy and Geoinformation in TU Wien University.
This work is supported by URBAN GEOmatics for Bulk Information Generation, Data Assessment and Technology Awareness (URBAN GEO BIG DATA), a Project of National Interest (PRIN) funded by the Italian Ministry of Education, University and Research (MIUR) - id. 20159CNLW8.
